array.name: A horror movie sound maker
array.description: Surprise guests by making them think It is hiding just around the corner.

array.name: An air-blaster
array.description: They say this loud and terrifying thing is for fun with family and friends, but it seems better suited to enemies and nemeses.

array.name: Surf and turf
array.description: For most people, surf and turf is something you might order at an expensive restaurant. For those who prioritize convenience over all things, it's a completely normal addition to your Amazon cart.

array.name: A Lincoln Memorial pillow
array.description: For some people, simply remembering your eighth grade trip to Washington D.C. isn't enoughâ€”and for those people, there's this pillow.

array.name: A baby mop
array.description: It's never too early to teach your children about chores, as evidenced by this suit that lets your baby mop the house for you.
